'''Darth Gandalf''' is a Youtube channel about Tolkien subjects. He makes long and short-form video essays on [[Middle-earth]].

He has a series called ''War in Middle-earth'', where he talks about all the (big) conflicts that ever happened in Arda. Another series of his is called ''Middle-earth Mysteries'', where he talks about things that Tolkien left open, such as the [[Blue Wizards]]. 

He has also said that he uses the [[Tolkien Gateway]] a lot.
